name: HoustonPublicMediaFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Add Houston Public Media to your Alexa Flash Briefing to receive the latest news and headlines from the Houston-area and around Texas.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
